name: Alchemist

items.name: Potion of Climbing
items.effect: Gain climbing speed equal to walking speed for 1 hour

items.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
items.effect: Cast Animal Friendship (save DC 13) for 1 hour

items.name: Potion of Fire Breath
items.effect: Exhale fire in a 30-ft cone, 4d6 fire damage

items.name: Potion of Resistance
items.effect: Gain resistance to one damage type for 1 hour

items.name: Basic Poison (vial)
items.effect: DC 10 Con save or 1d4 poison damage, coat one weapon or 3 pieces of ammunition

items.name: Assassin's Blood (ingested)
items.effect: DC 10 Con save or 6 (1d12) poison damage and Poisoned 24 hours

items.name: Malice (inhaled)
items.effect: DC 15 Con save or Poisoned 1 hour; also Blinded while Poisoned

items.name: Pale Tincture (ingested)
items.effect: DC 16 Con save or 3 (1d6) poison damage and Poisoned; repeat save each 24 hours, 7 (2d6) on fail, ends on success

items.name: Truth Serum (ingested)
items.effect: DC 11 Con save or Poisoned 1 hour and cannot knowingly lie

items.name: Acid (vial)
items.effect: 2d6 acid damage as improvised ranged weapon

items.name: Alchemist's Fire
items.effect: 1d4 fire damage per turn until extinguished (DC 10 Dex)

items.name: Antitoxin
items.effect: Advantage on saves vs. poison for 1 hour

items.name: Alchemist's Supplies
items.effect: Tool proficiency required to craft alchemical items

items.name: Herbalism Kit
items.effect: Required to craft Potions of Healing and Antitoxin

items.name: Poisoner's Kit
items.effect: Required to craft and handle poisons

flavor: Shelves lined with bubbling flasks and labeled jars. The sharp scent of reagents stings the nose. A cautious shopkeep measures ingredients with exacting precision.
